opening_theme: #1: "Yatterman no Uta (ヤッターマンの歌)" by Otoyakichiemon (eps 1-10)
#2: "Yatterman no Uta (ヤッターマンの歌)" by ET-KING (eps 11-17)
#3: "Yatterman no Uta (ヤッターマンの歌)" by Yuki Nishio (eps 18-21, 23-28)
#4: "Yatterman no Uta (Enka Version) (ヤッターマンの歌 (演歌バージョン))" by Yuki Nishio (ep 22)
#5: "Yatterman no Uta (ヤッターマンの歌)" by Fudanjuku (eps 29-35)
#6: "Yatterman no Uta (ヤッターマンの歌)" by Toshihiko Takamizawa (eps 36-59)
#7: "Yatterman no Uta (ヤッターマンの歌)" by Masayuki Yamamoto (ep 60)
ending_theme: #3: "Rensoukyoku (恋想曲)" by Manami Kurose with 12 violinists (eps 18-24)
#7: "Zero Kara Hajimeru Story (ZEROからはじめるストーリー)" by Wakaba (eps 49-60)
